definitions: the state of two or more people or things being separated in time or space

examples.text: their geographical apartness accentuated the otherness of their sound

shortDefinitions: state of being separated in time or space

definitions: the state of not being close emotionally

examples.text: national togetherness will shroud our apartness

shortDefinitions: state of not being close emotionally

definitions: the state of being isolated or at a distance from the main body

examples.text: people for whom apartness and solitude are sources of spiritual strength
the facelessness of the big city world and its apartness

shortDefinitions: state of being isolated or at distance from main body

definitions: the quality of being different or distinct from other people or things; individuality

examples.text: an event that emphasizes difference and apartness
a sense of exotic apartness from the cultural mainstream

shortDefinitions: quality of being different or distinct from other people or things
